message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being flexible. However, $14,000 is a bit out of my budget right now. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I really think this product is worth more than $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $13,500. What do you think?
